div.div: Meals for StudentsGallipolis City Schools will be offering lunches to go for all students and community members who are 18 or younger. Lunches may be picked up at the Gallia Academy Middle School Fourth Avenue entrance from 11:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. starting on Tuesday, March 17th. As of now, these services will run through April 3rd and will cover the days that students will be out of school under Governor ...
